isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 4000 SERIES SPLASH PANELS

svcsubproc.title: 4700 Thru 4900 Model Splash Panels - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 45 for items in parentheses.

figure.caption: Figure 45. 4000 Series Radiator to Shell and Splash Panel

step1.para: Remove the 4 push-in fasteners (Item 1) securing the radiator to shell seal (Item 2) to the hood. Remove the radiator to shell seal, passenger side shown.
Drill out the rivets (Item 3) attaching the hood/fender splash panel (Item 4) and remove it from the hood/fender assembly (Item 5), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side radiator to shell seal and hood/fender splash panel.

svcsubproc.title: 4700 Thru 4900 Model Splash Panels - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 45 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the hood/fender splash panel (Item 4) on the inner fender of the hood/fender assembly (Item 5) and install the rivets (Item 3) attaching it to the hood/fender assembly, passenger side shown.
Position the radiator to shell seal (Item 2) in place on the hood and install the 4 push-in fasteners (Item 1) securing it to the hood, passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install driver side hood/fender splash panel and radiator to shell seal.
